text.content:
Per Injenia - societ√† parte del Gruppo con sede a Bologna - siamo alla ricerca di programmatori software in ambito mobile per lo sviluppo e l'evoluzione di applicazioni mobile a livello di prodotti e progetti software basati principalmente su tecnologia Flutter.
Cerchiamo persone motivate, con la passione per le tecnologie e con la voglia di mettere un pizzico di valore aggiunto in quello che fanno.
Seguirai le fasi di sviluppo software, stesura del codice e documentazione del codice di progetto, sulla base delle direttive del responsabile di team e di progetto. Potrai partecipare alle fasi di analisi dei requisiti tecnici e di design delle soluzioni.

text.content: Siamo una Family Company da oltre cento anni. Conoscenza e tecnologia sono le nostre passioni, e il nostro business. Noi le trasformiamo in prodotti, servizi e soluzioni integrate per promuovere e sostenere la trasformazione digitale, l‚Äôinnovazione di processo e la semplificazione della Pubblica Amministrazione, delle Imprese e del mondo delle Libere Professioni. Grazie alla passione e alla competenza di oltre 2000 collaboratori abbiamo conquistato la leadership di mercato in Italia e siamo in forte crescita nel mercato internazionale.

text.content:
Satispay is an Italian Scale-up operating in the mobile payment industry. Having created a payment system independent from debit and credit cards, Satispay allows users to pay stores or friends from their smartphone. Our offices are in Milan, Luxembourg City and Berlin.
More than just an App, Satispay is a Company, a group of creative, curious, enthusiastic people determined to make an impact in everyday life!

After becoming a unicorn, we are not done yet: due to our recent growth, we have partnered with ONYON, an application that allows people to order and pay from the table directly with their smartphones and in total autonomy.
Do you want to be part of this new project?

rich_text.plain_text:
Satispay is an Italian Scale-up operating in the mobile payment industry. Having created a payment system independent from debit and credit cards, Satispay allows users to pay stores or friends from their smartphone. Our offices are in Milan, Luxembourg City and Berlin.
More than just an App, Satispay is a Company, a group of creative, curious, enthusiastic people determined to make an impact in everyday life!

After becoming a unicorn, we are not done yet: due to our recent growth, we have partnered with ONYON, an application that allows people to order and pay from the table directly with their smartphones and in total autonomy.
Do you want to be part of this new project?

text.content:
As a Flutter Software Engineer, you will work in a cross-functional ONYON‚Äôs team and will be specifically responsible for both web and mobile app development: from ideation and analysis of new features, to their development, testing, publishing and monitoring.

You‚Äôll be responsible for:
‚Ä¢ Fully understand the product and business
‚Ä¢ Identify points of improvement for the product
‚Ä¢ Refine ideas for new features with customers and stakeholders
‚Ä¢ Identify product enhancements that will help ONYON to achieve its goals in the marketplace
‚Ä¢ Implement new features on the web and mobile apps, writing clean, self-tested code (unit, integration, end-to-end)
‚Ä¢ Bring new app versions into production, monitoring the actual operation and results

rich_text.plain_text:
As a Flutter Software Engineer, you will work in a cross-functional ONYON‚Äôs team and will be specifically responsible for both web and mobile app development: from ideation and analysis of new features, to their development, testing, publishing and monitoring.

You‚Äôll be responsible for:
‚Ä¢ Fully understand the product and business
‚Ä¢ Identify points of improvement for the product
‚Ä¢ Refine ideas for new features with customers and stakeholders
‚Ä¢ Identify product enhancements that will help ONYON to achieve its goals in the marketplace
‚Ä¢ Implement new features on the web and mobile apps, writing clean, self-tested code (unit, integration, end-to-end)
‚Ä¢ Bring new app versions into production, monitoring the actual operation and results

text.content:
We are looking for brilliant talents willing to share our enthusiasm and passion for new projects. The stack ranges differs depending on the projects you are working on. On the Frontend side Flutter (web & mobile) & Angular, while for the Backend Node.js, MongoDB & RabbitMQ; Kubernetes on Microsoft Azure as infrastructure.

The ideal candidate will have:
‚Ä¢ Passion for the startup world, technology and innovative product development
‚Ä¢ Willingness to work in a team, collaborating with both other tech and business stakeholders
‚Ä¢ Experience in mobile and web application development (not necessarily with Flutter)
‚Ä¢ Experience in REST and GraphQL API integration
‚Ä¢ Ability to write automated tests at different levels (unit, integration, end-to-end)

Nice to have:
‚Ä¢ Experience in cross-functional teams with agile methodologies
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of Domain Driven Design or have applied it in the past
‚Ä¢ Experience with eXtreme Programming development practices (TDD, Pair Programming, Refactoring, CI) and clean code
‚Ä¢ Interest in working on the backend as well

The role is based in Milan, Italy. We apply a hybrid working policy.

Based on experience, the first gross annual salary will be up to ‚Ç¨ 30,000.00 per year for junior profiles and up to ‚Ç¨ 60,000.00 per year for senior profiles.

text.content:
We are Scaling parrots, a rapidly growing Brescia-based software house looking for skilled and motivated people to join our team of software developers.

Do you want to be part of a young, dynamic and constantly evolving technological team?
We firmly believe in a working method that is based on the constant study of new ideas, team working and the sharing of knowledge. In this way we have built a cohesive, dynamic and efficient team.

rich_text.plain_text:
We are Scaling parrots, a rapidly growing Brescia-based software house looking for skilled and motivated people to join our team of software developers.

Do you want to be part of a young, dynamic and constantly evolving technological team?
We firmly believe in a working method that is based on the constant study of new ideas, team working and the sharing of knowledge. In this way we have built a cohesive, dynamic and efficient team.

text.content:
In this role, you will be responsible for building and maintaining high-quality, cross-platform mobile applications.

To be successful in this role, you should have experience with Flutter and Dart, as well as knowledge of common mobile app development practices and design patterns. Experience with developing and maintaining APIs, working with remote data via REST and JSON, and integrating third-party libraries and frameworks is also a plus.

‚Ä¢ Develop and maintain high-quality, cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter and Dart
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with the product and design teams to define, design, and ship new features
‚Ä¢ Work with outside data sources and APIs
‚Ä¢ Unit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability
‚Ä¢ Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency

‚Ä¢ Experience working in a remote team is a plus

text.content:
¬†is a FinTech startup based in Turin that aims to become a smart digital bank natively focused on new digital services.

Our mission is to make the world of digital assets accessible to all. We want to help make the cryptocurrency industry fairer and more meaningful for everyone. That's why our exchanges allow you to start buying and selling cryptocurrencies at your own pace and habits.

In fact, through its products, Young Platform offers all the tools to freely manage digital assets: from an app to learn everything about crypto, to an intuitive platform to buy the first cryptocurrency, up to indicators and APIs for traders and professionals.

Our context is young and dynamic and is based on the sharing of information and continuous feedback, as fundamental tools for constant improvement and growth. We are curious people with very ambitious goals, which we achieve thanks to constant training. We make sure to teach the team what we know and learn what we don't know.

We firmly believe in transparency and dialogue and we encourage free initiative and a critical sense to make the best decisions and reach goals in record time.

We are looking for a¬†

r with at least 3 years of experience in developing native and/or hybrid mobile applications, who as part of the App Team will collaborate on the development and maintenance of Step and Young Platform applications and will be responsible for the following activities:

- Work in close partnership with cross-functional teams and management

text.content: Our hiring process aims to be as clear and streamlined as possible and includes 3 steps:

rich_text.plain_text: Our hiring process aims to be as clear and streamlined as possible and includes 3 steps:

text.content:
- Preliminary questionnaire, with which the motivational aspects of the application will be deepened
- Technical interview, aimed at assessing whether your skills are aligned with what we are looking for
- Final interview to verify the cultural fit with our reality.
In addition to these steps we may request a further interview or an assessment to be carried out offline.


Those interested in this position can send their CV stating that they grant authorization for the processing of personal data based on art. 13 of Legislative Decree 196/03 and art. 13 of the GDPR (EU Regulation 2016/679).

text.content: Mobile Developer Junior | S.E.C. - System Engineering Consulting

title.plain_text: Mobile Developer Junior | S.E.C. - System Engineering Consulting

text.content:
S.E.C. - System Engineering Consulting, azienda di consulenza con ventennale esperienza nello sviluppo di APP, ricerca Mobile Developer da inserire nel proprio organico.

Requisiti essenziali:
‚Ä¢	Conoscenza di Swift 
‚Ä¢	Conoscenza di Flutter

Requisiti preferenziali:
‚Ä¢	Esperienza con Swift e Flutter 
‚Ä¢	Esperienza nella costruzione e distribuzione di app mobile per iOS e Android 
‚Ä¢	Comprensione della programmazione orientata a oggetti e pattern di progettazione
‚Ä¢	Esperienza con Git e controllo versione 
‚Ä¢	Abilit√† di debug e risoluzione dei problemi 
‚Ä¢	Abilit√† comunicative e capacit√† di lavorare in un ambiente di squadra

Il candidato ideale √® motivato e determinato e ha dimestichezza con lo sviluppo mobile ed i relativi strumenti, √® curioso verso le nuove tecnologie ed ama mettersi in gioco con linguaggi e piattaforme diversificate. 

Ti offriamo: 
‚Ä¢	Contratto indeterminato, previo periodo di prova
‚Ä¢	Smarworking due giorni alla settimana
‚Ä¢	Sede di lavoro a Milano, a 20 metri dalla fermata Gambara
‚Ä¢	Formazione e affiancamento costante con i nostri consulenti senior
‚Ä¢	Retribuzione da definire in base all'esperienza
‚Ä¢	Concrete possibilit√† di crescita professionale

text.content:
Per Injenia - societ√† parte del Gruppo con sede a Bologna - siamo alla ricerca di programmatori software in ambito mobile per lo sviluppo e l'evoluzione di applicazioni mobile a livello di prodotti e progetti software basati principalmente su tecnologia Flutter.
Cerchiamo persone motivate, con la passione per le tecnologie e con la voglia di mettere un pizzico di valore aggiunto in quello che fanno.
Seguirai le fasi di sviluppo software, stesura del codice e documentazione del codice di progetto, sulla base delle direttive del responsabile di team e di progetto. Potrai partecipare alle fasi di analisi dei requisiti tecnici e di design delle soluzioni.
